resources.string: Unable to charge due to abnormal temperature
Bluetooth is used to operate REON POCKET.

Check the following, then try again.\10Check the unit is sufficiently charged.\10Check your smartphone\'s Bluetooth function is on.\10Check your smartphone is near to the unit.\10 \10If it still does not pair, check the methods shown under \"Press here if it will not pair\".
If your attempt fails repeatedly, please visit the support page.
The Bluetooth function of your smartphone is turned off.\10Please turn on the Bluetooth function.
The Bluetooth function of your smartphone is turned off.\10Do you want to turn on the Bluetooth function?
The location service is turned off. Turn it on and try again to grant REON POCKET Bluetooth connection. The location won\'t be tracked by the app. This is a procedural requirement by Android.
The device is running out of charge. Charge it and try again.

Check the following and try again:\10- Check the device is connected to a power supply using a USB cable.\10- Check your smartphone is connected to the internet.\10- Check your smartphone is near the device.
This unit is already registered to another smartphone.\10Cancel the device registration and try connecting again.\10 \10When connecting, ensure there are no other REON POCKET units in the vicinity.

This device is already paired to another smartphone.\10To register to this smartphone, reset the device by pressing and holding the device button for about 15 seconds, and try to connect again.\10\10When connecting the device, make sure there is not another REON POCKET device nearby.

This device is already registered to another smartphone.\10 To register to this smartphone, press and hold the [SMART] button for five seconds to reset device registration (pairing) information, then try to pair the device again.\10 \10When connecting, make sure that there are no other REON POCKET devices nearby.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
If the LED is not blinking blue, press the button on your device.

Lightly press the button on your device.\10Wait until the LED starts blinking blue and tap [CONNECT].\10\10* If the LED does not blink, the battery of your device may be low. Connect your device to a power supply using a USB cable and tap [CONNECT].

After turning the power on, press and hold the [SMART] button on the device for two seconds.\10 When the LED on the [SMART] button side flashes blue, press [CONNECT].\10 \10*If the power does not turn on, the device may not be charged. Charge the device by connecting it to a power supply using a USB cable.

The temperature around the USB port on the REON POCKET unit is rising.\10 Unplug the USB cable from the charger without touching the area around the USB port.\10 \10There may be a problem with the charging function. Check the support page.
The temperature around the USB port on the REON POCKET unit is rising. Unplug the USB cable from the charger without touching the area around the USB port.
Charging has been temporarily paused as the device may not be not charging correctly, or there may be a fault occurring with the charging function.\10 \10See the support page for details.
The device may not be charging correctly, or there may be a fault occurring with the charging function.
Keep the device at room temperature for a while and try again.
The fan in the device is malfunctioning. If this problem occurs repeatedly, please visit the support page.
The device battery has run out of charge. Please charge for a while and try again.
The device is in low temperature. Wait until the device temperature increases.
The device is in high temperature. Wait until the device temperature decreases.
The device battery has run out of charge. Charge it and try again.
Wait for a while and try to use again. If this problem occurs repeatedly, please visit the support page.
Charging has been temporarily paused as the device may not be not charging correctly, or there may be a fault occurring with the charging function.\10 \10See the support page for details.
The device may not be charging correctly, or there may be a fault occurring with the charging function.
Charging has been temporarily paused as the device may not be not charging correctly, or there may be a fault occurring with the charging function.\10 \10See the support page for details.
The device may not be charging correctly, or there may be a fault occurring with the charging function.
Unregister this device from the app. The pairing information in your smartphone\'s OS will not be deleted. The pairing information in your smartphone\'s OS can be deleted via its Bluetooth settings.
Do you want to unregister this device?

Wear breathable and roomy clothing in white or other light colors that absorb less heat than dark clothing.\10\10Also, allow room around the neck to prevent the exhaust from being blocked.\10If the exhaust is blocked, e.g. by a shirt collar, it is recommended to use the dedicated neckband and the supplied air vent cover.
Wear breathable and roomy clothing in white or other light-colors.
Is REON POCKET fixed in the correct position on the base of your neck?\10In case it is shifted downward, it may not feel cool enough.
Make sure that REON POCKET is in contact with the correct position on the base of your neck.
Is REON POCKET fixed in the correct position on the base of your neck?\10In case it is shifted downward, it may not feel warm enough.

If you use MANUAL COOL mode continuously at a high cooling level, the cooling effect will not be maintained as well.\10If you are using the unit for a long period of time, we recommend that you either start from low cooling and gradually increase the strength, or use SMART COOL mode.
Are you sure you want to keep using the unit at a high cooling level?
When WAVE is turned on, the level of coldness is automatically increased and decreased.
The fan in the device is malfunctioning. If this problem occurs repeatedly, please visit our support page.
The fan in the device is malfunctioning
The inside of REON POCKET is getting hot.\10Please make sure your wearing style is correct.
The inside of the device is getting hot.
Wait until the device cools down.
The device is in high temperature
The device is running out of battery.
Wait until the device gets warm.
The device is in low temperature
Charging has stopped due to the high temperature of the device.\10Wait until the device cools down.
Charging has stopped due to the low temperature of the device.\10Wait until the device gets warm.
Hold down the button on the device for approximately 15 seconds to reset, then try charging again.
If your attempt fails repeatedly, please visit our support page.
Date does not match expected pattern: %1$s
Date out of expected year range %1$s - %2$s
Swipe to select a year, or tap to switch back to selecting a day
Scroll to show the next month
Scroll to show the previous month

The unit automatically starts cooling/warming when attached at the base of your neck, and automatically stops when removed and placed on a table, etc.\10 \10This feature can be enabled/disabled later via the settings screen.

The device automatically starts cooling/warming when attached at the base of your neck, and automatically stops when removed and placed on a table, etc.\10\10This feature can be enabled/disabled later via the settings screen.\10To disable it manually, hold down the button on the device for two seconds.

The device automatically starts cooling/warming when attached at the base of your neck, and automatically stops when removed and placed on a table, etc.\10 \10This feature can be enabled/disabled later via the settings screen.\10 To disable it manually, hold down the [START/STOP] button on the device for two seconds.

This application requires permission to access location information even when the application is closed, in order to notify you when the battery level of the device is low. Please select \"Always allow.\"\10\10Access to location information is also used to obtain the operating data of the device and to develop and improve products and services. Location information access is necessary for Bluetooth communication with REON POCKET, but location information itself is not acquired or stored.\10This feature can be enabled/disabled later via the settings screen.\"
The temperature of your surroundings may be unable to be obtained as the tag part may be facing your body or inside a pocket, etc.
Cooling temperature is automatically adjusted\10using information from multiple sensors
*Could not start as ambient temperature is unknown due to being unable to receive tag data.
Cooling/warming temperature is automatically adjusted\10using information from multiple sensors
The temperature of the part of the unit in contact with the body is high, so the cooling is on high
The temperature/humidity around the unit is high, so the cooling is on high
The temperature/humidity or illumination around the tag is high, so the cooling is on high
The temperature of the part of the unit in contact with the body is high, so COOL mode is activated
The temperature/humidity around the unit is high, so COOL mode is activated
The temperature/humidity around the tag is low, so the warming is on high
The temperature/humidity is not high, so the cooling is on low
The temperature around the tag is not high, but the temperature of the part in contact with the body is high, so cooling is on low
The temperature/humidity around the tag is not high, but the temperature/humidity around the unit is high, so cooling is on low
The temperature/humidity is not low, so the warming is on low
*Could not start as ambient temperature is unknown due to being unable to receive tag data.
Warming temperature is automatically adjuste\10using information from multiple sensors
REON POCKET stops automatically after 1 hour in WARM mode.
COOL/WARM automatically deactivates after a set period of time has passed.\10\10You will be sent a notification when this happens, so please enable notifications.
When warmer \10than this temperature, \10switches to COOL.

The temperature switched to when switching to COOL (A) or WARM (B) can be set to match your preferences (*). Temporarily stopped for power saving since the temperature is in an appropriate level in case that ambient temperature is between (A) and (B).\10*Switching operation is a guideline only.
When cooler \10than this temperature, \10switches to WARM.

SMART COOL mode will function automatically based on your preference. \10*Battery life will last longer when \"Low Cool\" is selected (Battery life will last less time when \"High Cool\" is selected).

SMART COOL ⇔ WARM mode will function automatically based on your preference. \10*Battery life will last longer when \"Low Cool\" or \"Low Warm\" is selected (battery life will last for less time when \"High Cool\" or \"High Warm\" is selected).

SMART WARM mode will function automatically based on your preference. \10*Battery life will last longer when \"Low Warm\" is selected (battery life will last for less time when \"High Warm\" is selected).
Switching to SMART COOL ⇔ WARM mode...
Automatically stopped by AUTO STOP function
Cannot operate while WARM is working
Cannot switch to OFF while COOL is working

If you use the unit at a high cooling level continuously for a long period of time, it will be harder to feel the cooling effect.\10If this occurs, we recommend enabling WAVE.\10This will automatically increase and decrease the strength of the cooling.
You cannot operate the device while charging. Wait until it is fully charged and try again.
Your device has been registered successfully
Please select the device to register.

Register REON POCKET. Lightly press the button on the device.\10 When the LED flashes blue, press [Start Device Registration].\10 \10*If the LED does not start flashing, the device may not be charged. Connect the device to a power supply with a USB cable, then press [Start Device Registration].\10 \10Make sure that there are no other REON POCKET devices nearby.

Register REON POCKET PRO. After turning the power on, press and hold the [SMART] button on the device for two seconds.\10 When the LED on the [SMART] button side flashes blue, press [Start Device Registration].\10 \10*If the power does not turn on, the device may not be charged. Charge the device by connecting it to a power supply using a USB cable.\10 \10Make sure that there are no other REON POCKET devices nearby.
A Bluetooth pairing request has been received from a smartphone. Pair the device as requested.
Press here if it will not pair.

If device registration fails repeatedly, try again using the following steps.\10 \101. Press and hold the button on the device for 15 seconds to unregister the device.\10 (The LED will repeatedly flash blue at 0.5-second intervals.)\10 \102. Turn your smartphone\'s Bluetooth function off and then on again.\10 \103. Tap [Register Device] on the REON POCKET app.

If device registration fails repeatedly, try again using the following steps.\10 \101. Press and hold the button on the device for 15 seconds to unregister the device (pairing).\10 (The LED will repeatedly flash blue at 0.5-second intervals.)\10 \102. Unregister the REON POCKET pairing from your smartphone settings. \103. Turn your smartphone\'s Bluetooth function off and then on again.\10 \104. Tap [Register Device] on the REON POCKET app.

If device registration fails repeatedly, try again using the following steps.\10 \101. After turning the power on, press the [SMART] button for five seconds to unregister the device.\10 (The LED will repeatedly flash blue at 0.5-second intervals.)\10 \102. Turn your smartphone\'s Bluetooth function off and then on again.\10 \103. Tap [Register Device] on the REON POCKET app.

If device registration fails repeatedly, try again using the following steps.\10 \101. After turning the power on, press and hold the [SMART] button for five seconds to unregister the device (pairing).\10 (The LED will repeatedly flash blue at 0.5-second intervals.)\10 \102. Unregister the REON POCKET pairing from your smartphone settings. \103. Turn your smartphone\'s Bluetooth function off and then on again.\10 \104. Tap [Register Device] on the REON POCKET app.
If REON POCKET does not pair
If REON POCKET PRO does not pair
Please check the network connection and try again.
You need to update the app to use it.\10Please update.

The device automatically starts cooling/warming when you simply attach it at the base of your neck.\10The device automatically stops cooling/warming when removed and placed on a table, etc.\10When started with the AUTO START/STOP function, the unit operates in the same mode as last time.

The AUTO START/STOP function is currently enabled.\10REON POCKET automatically activates/deactivates depending on whether it is attached or removed and placed on a table, etc.\10This can be disabled in \"Settings.\"
Do not put the device away from the smartphone.
Please wait for a while.\10The software is now being transferred.

Device software will be updated. An update to improve the functions of the device is available.\10The update will take 1 minute and cannot be canceled after it has started.\10Run the update in an environment where you can access the Internet.
Do not close the app until software update is completed.
This device will be initialized. If you tap [OK], you cannot cancel this operation.
Do you want to initialize the device?

You may be asked to allow this app to access this Android device\'s location to grant REON POCKET Bluetooth connection.\10The location won\'t be used by the app. It\'s just a procedural requirement by Android.
The device battery has run out of charge
The estimated remaining battery life is around %1$d minutes
The auto power off duration has elapsed.

COOL/WARM can be started without using the app by pressing the button on the device for two seconds (the LED will light up green). This will run REON POCKET with the same mode/settings that it was running last time. To stop, hold the button for two seconds (the LED will flash green).
Run the mode that REON POCKET was running last time
Background location information access permission is required

This application requires permission to access location information, even when the application is closed, in order to notify you when the battery level of the device is low. Please select \"Always allow.\"\10\10Access to location information is also used to obtain the operating data of the device and to develop and improve products and services.\10\10Location information access is necessary for Bluetooth communication with REON POCKET, but location information itself is not acquired or stored.\"

You will be asked to allow this app to access this Android device\'s location to grant REON POCKET Bluetooth connection.\10Please allow access permission.\10The location data won\'t be used by the app. It\'s just a procedural requirement by Android.
Nearby devices permission is necessary to grant REON POCKET Bluetooth connection.\10Please allow access permission.
Do you want to unregister this device?
The fan is currently running to exhaust heat from the inside of the REON POCKET.
You need to update the app to use it.\10Please update.
Do not move the tag away from the smartphone.
Please wait for a while.\10The software is now being transferred.
Press the button on the tag.

Check the following and try again after register tag: \10When the update begins, press the button on the tag and check that the LED starts blinking (After 10 seconds, LED will be turned off and the update process will be disabled).\10Check your smartphone is near the tag.
The battery will soon run out of charge.
The battery will soon run out of charge.
The temperature of your surroundings may be unable to be obtained as the sensor part may be facing your body or inside a pocket, etc.
Data could not be received\10Pressing the button on the tag makes it easier to receive.
Receiving data…\10Press the button on the tag to help receive data.
Do you want to register this tag? Check whether the serial number matches the one on the tag\'s battery cover. \10Only one tag can be registered.
Do you want to register again? \10\10Please register tag as soon as it\'s found.\10It can fail over time.
Do you want to register again? \10\10Check your smartphone is near the tag and try again.
Press the button on the tag and wait until the LED starts blinking blue, then tap [REGISTER].
Do you want to unregister this tag?
For purposes such as development or improvement of our products and services, please enter the following information.
I read the above contents and agree.
Please confirm the end user license agreement and privacy policy of this application.

REON POCKET is a wearable thermal device that can directly cool or warm the part of the body that the device is in contact with.\10 Using the dedicated REON POCKET app, you can adjust settings such as the COOL/WARM temperature level to your preferences.
Please first review and agree to the end user license agreement and privacy policy for this application, then press [START].
The end user license agreement and privacy policy have been updated.
